meaningMnemonic: This <radical>canopy</radical>, after your <radical>departure</radical>, will become <kanji>obsolete</kanji>. The canopy was here to protect you, but no one will need it once you're gone.
readingMnemonic: When something becomes <kanji>obsolete</kanji>, you must write a <reading>hai</reading>ku (はい). Honestly, the best haiku are about something ending, so this is perfect.
